title: Hyou to Ookami: Doitsugun 5-gou Sensha 1944
original_name: 豹と狼 ドイツ軍 5 号戦車 1944
sinopse: The story involved around a group of German tanker under command Lt. Wolfgang ‘Wolf’ Guderian who manned a Panther tank call sign 123. They met a Rumanian resistance girl named Origa in their mission at Eastern front when they in middle trouble escaping from Soviet heavy tank in 1944. Wolf’s group and Origa decided to help each other and managed to destroy their enemy tank through battle tactic and sharp shot of her gunnery skill.
